thread.title: VW condemned for testing diesel fuel on monkeys

title: VW condemned for testing diesel fuel on monkeys
text:
VW condemned for testing diesel fuel on monkeys Monday, January 29, 2018 - 01:54 
Volkswagen's supervisory board called on Monday for an immediate inquiry into who ordered scientific tests in which monkeys were exposed to toxic diesel fumes, while the German government said such studies were unjustifiable.   
Volkswagen's supervisory board called on Monday for an immediate inquiry into who ordered scientific tests in which monkeys were exposed to toxic diesel fumes, while the German government said such studies were unjustifiable.  //reut.rs/2DLhPPZ
